title: [Large-scale] VR-Based Advanced Mathematics Job Training: Practical Competency Enhancement Through Simulation and Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in foundational mathematics concepts and their application to professional tasks
context.additional_context: An advanced course for corporate practitioners applying mathematical modeling in a VR environment, providing personalized feedback through learning analytics

learning_goals: Learners can solve spatial geometry problems in a VR simulation environment with 80% accuracy.
Learners can interpret their VR learning data and develop improvement plans using learning analytics tools.
Learners can implement the mathematical modeling process with VR tools (e.g., 3D graph generators) and apply it to real-world work scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
